overview_summary: Among the adjacent landowners are two small construction companies and three property-holding LLCs. The contractors (Concrete Coring Co. and H & H Masonry) are long-established local businesses focused on operations, with moderate influence but no record of active opposition to development ([leadiq.com](https://leadiq.com/c/concrete-coring-company/5ecfdf3c8a998f161e9aa337/employee-directory?page=2#:~:text=Construction%20%20351)). The other owners are investment-oriented LLCs (including a developer-tied entity controlling ~15 acres) that have minimal public profiles, suggesting a speculative stance and potential development-driven motives ([www.zillow.com](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/8789-N-75th-Ave-Peoria-AZ-85345/146069385_zpid/#:~:text=2%2F7%2F2025%20%20,Public%20Record%20Report%20a%20problem)) ([provence-sites.com](https://provence-sites.com/arizona-corporation#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%201,status%2C%20type%20and%20creation%20date)).

neighbors.name: Mlm Property Management Llc
neighbors.claims: MLM Property Management LLC is an Arizona-registered LLC with no publicly listed operations beyond holding its Peoria property【27†L12-L19; "registered with ... business name, principal address, mailing address, owner name"】. It has no online presence or media mentions, indicating the company serves purely as a landowner without active business activity or community engagement ([provence-sites.com](https://provence-sites.com/arizona-corporation#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%201,status%2C%20type%20and%20creation%20date)). Beneficial ownership is not disclosed in public records, and no evidence of the LLC’s stance on local development issues could be found ([provence-sites.com](https://provence-sites.com/arizona-corporation#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%201,status%2C%20type%20and%20creation%20date)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Single-parcel owner; anonymous in community with no known influence or local involvement

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out via registered agent or mailing address; emphasize how the project could raise nearby property values and ensure their property remains undisturbed

neighbors.name: Concrete Coring Company Inc
neighbors.claims: Concrete Coring Company, Inc. is a long-established Arizona construction firm (founded in 1961) specializing in concrete cutting and coring【84†L1-L4; "Leading the industry since 1961."】. The company operates a facility at 8629 N 78th Ave in Peoria and provides 24/7 concrete cutting services from that industrial location【83†L28-L31; "8629 N 78th Ave Phoenix, AZ 85345"】. It employs roughly 51–200 people and is based out of Glendale, AZ, reflecting a significant local presence built over decades【85†L8-L11; "51-200 Employees ... Glendale, Arizona"】. Concrete Coring is privately held and focused on its contracting business; there are no indications of the company taking public positions on land development issues ([leadiq.com](https://leadiq.com/c/concrete-coring-company/5ecfdf3c8a998f161e9aa337/employee-directory?page=2#:~:text=Construction%20%20351)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Long-standing employer (~60+ years, ~200 staff); regionally important contractor but limited political engagement

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the company’s management (owner or general manager) directly; highlight potential subcontracting or supply opportunities in the project and reassure that construction will not impede their facility access

neighbors.name: H And H Masonry Inc
neighbors.claims: H & H Masonry Inc. appears to be a small Arizona masonry contractor operating in the same industrial area near N 78th Avenue【89†L1-L4; "P&Q Inc ... 8903 N 78TH AVE ... $31,531"】. The company has no website or significant online footprint; outside of basic state business registry listings, there is little public information available ([provence-sites.com](https://provence-sites.com/arizona-corporation#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%201,status%2C%20type%20and%20creation%20date)). No records of political contributions, community activism, or involvement in local development disputes were found for H & H Masonry, suggesting it remains a low-profile private business ([www.governmentcontractswon.com](https://www.governmentcontractswon.com/department/defense/peoria_az_arizona.asp#:~:text=P%26Q%20INC%208903%20N%2078TH,3%20%2431%2C531%20PAP%2C%20MONA%20L)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Small subcontractor with minimal public presence; no evident influence in community or politics
potential_motivators: Potential subcontract work from new projects
Avoiding any new regulations or costs

approach_recommendations.engage: Identify the owner (or principal) and have a personal conversation to assure the project won’t hinder their work; consider offering them subcontracting opportunities or other benefits to gain their goodwill

neighbors.name: 8769 75Th Ave Llc
neighbors.claims: 8769 75th Ave LLC is a property holding entity (likely formed for development purposes) that owns the largest adjacent tract (over 15 acres) on 75th Avenue【87†L1-L4; "2/7/2025  | Sold  | $2,075,000...+200.7%"】. Its ownership is shielded behind the LLC, with no principals named in public filings (beneficial owner is unknown) ([provence-sites.com](https://provence-sites.com/arizona-corporation#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%201,status%2C%20type%20and%20creation%20date)). Real estate activity around this parcel suggests a speculative investment: a neighboring 1.95-acre lot sold for $2.075 million in Feb 2025, a 200% increase from its 2019 sale price【87†L1-L4; "2/7/2025  | Sold  | $2,075,000...+200.7%"】. This trend indicates the LLC’s land is in an area of high development interest, implying the entity may be positioning for a future project or profitable resale rather than opposing new development ([www.zillow.com](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/8789-N-75th-Ave-Peoria-AZ-85345/146069385_zpid/#:~:text=2%2F7%2F2025%20%20,Public%20Record%20Report%20a%20problem)) ([provence-sites.com](https://provence-sites.com/arizona-corporation#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%201,status%2C%20type%20and%20creation%20date)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Controls ~15 acres of land; likely has significant financial backing for development, though owners remain behind an LLC veil

approach_recommendations.engage: Utilize official records to identify the developer behind this LLC and initiate discussions; propose coordinating on zoning/infrastructure and highlight mutual benefits (such as shared improvements) to reduce competitive tension or opposition

neighbors.name: Jmm 8657 Llc
neighbors.claims: JMM 8657 LLC is an opaque landholding company (named after its street address) with no active business operations apparent besides owning its parcel ([provence-sites.com](https://provence-sites.com/arizona-corporation#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%201,status%2C%20type%20and%20creation%20date)). The LLC’s owners are not listed in any public sources, and it has no discernible presence in news or community discussions, indicating a purely speculative or passive investment role ([provence-sites.com](https://provence-sites.com/arizona-corporation#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%201,status%2C%20type%20and%20creation%20date)). There is no record of JMM 8657 LLC engaging in development processes or taking any stance on local projects, implying that it will act primarily in its financial self-interest regarding any new development nearby ([provence-sites.com](https://provence-sites.com/arizona-corporation#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%201,status%2C%20type%20and%20creation%20date)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Single-parcel speculative owner; no public identity or leverage in local affairs

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out through the LLC’s registered agent to gauge interest in selling or partnering; emphasize that the project could increase their land’s market value and offer an exit strategy at a premium
